project.name: MapComplete Maxspeed
project.description: This map shows the legally allowed maximum speed on every road.

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Maxspeed has a layer Maxspeed showing features with this tag

The MapComplete theme Maxspeed has a layer Maxspeed showing features with this tag

Layer 'Maxspeed' shows id~.+ with a fixed text, namely 'You just created this element! Thanks for sharing this info with the world and helping people worldwide.' (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Maxspeed') (This is only shown if _backend~.+ & _last_edit:passed_time<300 & (_version_number= | _version_number=1))
Layer 'Maxspeed' shows and asks freeform values for key 'maxspeed' (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Maxspeed')

Layer 'Maxspeed' shows highway=living_street & _country=be with a fixed text, namely 'This is a living street, which has a maxspeed of 20km/h' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Maxspeed')
The MapComplete theme Maxspeed has a layer Speed Camera showing features with this tag

Layer 'Speed Camera' shows id~.+ with a fixed text, namely 'You just created this element! Thanks for sharing this info with the world and helping people worldwide.' (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Maxspeed') (This is only shown if _backend~.+ & _last_edit:passed_time<300 & (_version_number= | _version_number=1))

The layer 'Speed Camera allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
